comments.creator: alessio.placitelli@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
In the postmortem for the [v1 of our process](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1QqmZCoOq2Y95hHs1iuivMuiqDgJC54anojoDkeqsG_o/edit) we identified a way to improve the current process for both the submitter and the team handling the process.

This bug is for providing a new revision of the process, submitting it for feedback and rolling it out.
comments.author: alessio.placitelli@gmail.com
comments.text:
In the postmortem for the [v1 of our process](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1QqmZCoOq2Y95hHs1iuivMuiqDgJC54anojoDkeqsG_o/edit) we identified a way to improve the current process for both the submitter and the team handling the process.

This bug is for providing a new revision of the process, submitting it for feedback and rolling it out.

comments.raw_text:
The final proposal lives here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1PSUMbABdqkJnbb2xYmRB86Lnj8k0SgPnPmCi49KiL78/edit#
The template document for new proposals lives here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/18Kw4aVSpDs9dQS_a-BPRGRxibjCttftH0F83UksfK9w/edit#

I will send out an email today to all the relevant stakeholders.
comments.creator: alessio.placitelli@gmail.com

comments.raw_text: The new process is now [publicly documented](https://wiki.mozilla.org/Glean/Adding_or_changing_Glean_metric_types) and an email was sent out to all the stakeholders.
